front.title: IEEE Standard Secure Data Exchange (SDE) - Protocol Implementation Conformance Statement (PICS) Proforma (Annex 2L)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Withdrawn Jan 16, 2004. The secure data exchange (SDE) protocol implementation conformance statement (PICS) proforma is provided. The SDE PICS proforma defines the information to be supplied by protocol implementors claiming conformance with IEEE Std 802.10, Clause 2, Secure Data Exchange (SDE).
